document.discussion_title: How San Francisco public transit is fighting back against manspreaders
document.topic_text: California's mass transit agencies are taking a stand against the "manspreaders" and seat hogs of the world. San Francisco 's Bay Area Rapid Transit board voted to adopt a " one ticket, one seat " ordinance last week, which will fine
document.post: California's mass transit agencies are taking a stand against the "manspreaders" and seat hogs of the world. San Francisco 's Bay Area Rapid Transit board voted to adopt a " one ticket, one seat " ordinance last week, which will fine
